name: Asetek
goal:
For more than 20 years, premier thermal solutions from Asetek have been cooling processors around the globe. Our coolers can be found in the latest high-end gaming PC’s and official Esports tournament machines. They are also sought-after by enthusiasts for their reliable operation, ease-of-use and pervasive cooling. Moreover, our All-In-One coolers are used in some of the fastest computers in the world to enable advances that drive our everyday lives.

Technology for Data Centers:
This commitment to innovate has brought advances in performance and increased density for data centers as well. From high performance computing that secures entire countries, to artificial intelligence that is spawning an explosion of new applications for data center users. We’re innovating to increase density for maximum compute throughput in data centers.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
